listing.name: Laptop Repair Services

listing.description: 'NEVER FEAR, TKAI IS HERE.' Reliable laptop repair services. 3 day repair duration and 3 month gura antee. We can repair various issues, both hardware and software... We will quote you a price once we do a free initial assessment. Support Acer laptop.
